data.name: "Asemblance: Oversight" Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
"Asemblance: Oversight" Original Sountrack by Johnny Goss. Over 40 minutes of music fully remastered.

You'll find the file in your Steam directory upon purchase:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Asemblance Oversight\Soundtrack

Tracklist
01 - Oversight
02 - Cycles and Patterns
03 - Asemblance Office B
04 - Ganzfeld Anomaly
05 - Installation
06 - 3F06
07 - Tessera Valley
08 - Magellan
09 - Memory Index
10 - Metaplasiticity
11 - Bester's Directive
12 - Null
13 - Venera 17
